rule.description: ATT&CK T1027: Invoke-Obfuscation Obfuscated IEX Invocation
rule.info: Detects all variations of obfuscated powershell IEX invocation code generated by Invoke-Obfuscation framework from the following code block — https://github.com/danielbohannon/Invoke-Obfuscation/blob/master/Out-ObfuscatedStringCommand.ps1#L873-L888
